function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of PCR targeting SARS-CoV-2 RdRP and M-gene in wastewater analysis.","Impact":"Potential for incorrect detection of SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater samples.","Mitigation":"Validation of PCR results through additional testing or comparison with alternative detection methods.","Technologies":"Advanced PCR techniques, sequencing technologies for verification.","People":"Researchers, public health authorities, and the community at risk of misinterpretation of results.","Owner":"Researchers, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Viral outgrowth assay using Caco-2 cells for detecting SARS-CoV-2 infection in wastewater samples.","Impact":"Risk of false-positive or false-negative results in detecting SARS-CoV-2 infection.","Mitigation":"Validation of assay results using alternative cell lines or culture methods, and cross-validation with molecular detection methods.","Technologies":"Advanced cell culture techniques, molecular detection methods for cross-validation.","People":"Researchers, public health authorities, and the community at risk of misinterpretation of results.","Owner":"Researchers, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Comparison of RT-qPCR primer and probe efficiency for detecting SARS-CoV-2 genes in wastewater.","Impact":"Potential for inaccurate detection of SARS-CoV-2 genes due to primer inefficiency.","Mitigation":"Validation of primer efficiency through comparison with validated primer sets and sequencing confirmation.","Technologies":"RT-qPCR, sequencing technologies for validation.","People":"Researchers, public health authorities, and the community at risk of misinterpretation of results.","Owner":"Researchers, public health authorities."}]}
